title: ValuationDates
description: Defines how and when a performance type option or performance type swap is to be valued, including initial, interim and final valuation dates.

valuationDatesInitial.description: Specifies the initial valuation dates of the underlyer.

valuationDatesInterim.description: Specifies the interim valuation dates of the underlyer.

valuationDatesFinal.description: Specifies the final valuation dates of the underlyer.
